meta.description: Welcome to Prathmesh's Portfolio. Prathmesh is a CS Grad @ San Jose State Univeristy! Data Engineering | Big Data | Cloud Engineering | Machine Learning | Artificial Intelligence
meta.author: Prathmesh

hero.tag_line: Harnessing the power of data, one query at a time
hero.description: Prathmesh is a dedicated software enthusiast, channeling his passion into every line of code he writes. When he’s not immersed in software development, you’ll find him exploring his love for hardware by creating innovative projects. Outside of tech, he enjoys the simple pleasures of biking and cycling, finding peace and inspiration on the open road. Always eager to share his knowledge, Prathmesh believes in lifelong learning and the joy of teaching others

about.about_tag_line:
Every great Idea begin with
an even better story
about.about_description: Prathmesh Pethkar is a passionate software developer and a creative thinker, dedicated to turning complex problems into elegant solutions. With a keen interest in machine learning and big data, he constantly seeks to expand his knowledge and skills. When he’s not coding, you can find him building innovative hardware projects or enjoying the serenity of the outdoors on his bike. Prathmesh believes in the power of collaboration and loves to mentor others on their learning journeys.

certifications.title: Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer
certifications.description: Expertise in designing, building, and managing data processing systems on Google Cloud.

certifications.title: Snowflake SnowPro Core Certification
certifications.description: Proficiency in implementing Snowflake data cloud solutions.

mentorship.title: Intern Mentorship Program
mentorship.description: Guided junior colleagues at Datametica in mastering emerging technologies, including modern data engineering tools. Assisted them in developing efficient data pipelines, enhancing their debugging skills, and promoting best practices in coding and process optimization.

mentorship.title: Hindu YUVA Coordinator
mentorship.description: As a Hindu YUVA Coordinator, mentored new international students by organizing airport pickups, providing course guidance, and facilitating career growth events. Helped them adjust to academic life, navigate cultural differences, and explore career opportunities through networking initiatives.
